title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Dining Saloon", 1934–35
inscribed: At left inscribed vertically: Height - 80 3/4" Dining Salon; width of columnar border at far left: 12 1/4"; height of window at far left: 34"; width of window at far left: 24 1/2; height of panel below window at far left: 40 3/8; width of columnar border at left: 19 1/2; width of center left window: 28 1/2; width of center right window: 28 5/8; width of columnar border at right: 17 1/2; width of window at far right: 34 1/2; height of window at far right: 33 3/8; height of panel below window at far right: 42.
description: Wall elevation of dining salon in the Lady Esther Yacht. Four curtained windows above decorative panel inset in wall. Separating windows are decorative columnar borders or panels, two borders at center with wall sconce at top. Indecipherable drawing at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Dining Saloon", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on cream paper, burned. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-312-11.
